times=input()
while times:
    times-=1
    n=input()
    l=[int(x) for x in raw_input().split()]
    i=0
    maxi=-23
    while i<n:
        j=i+1
        count=0
        while j<n:
            if(l[j]-l[i]-(j-i)==0):
                count+=1
            j+=1
        if(count+1>maxi):
            maxi=count+1
        i+=1
    print n-maxi
